protocol.name: P-G17675-1
protocol.text: plants were grown on MSagar plates for xx days with 16h/8h light/dark cycle at 70% relative humidity at 20C in a growth chamber.

protocol.name: P-G17675-3
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 3 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual Rev. 3, 2005, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-G17675-4
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. The normalized data were log-transformed with base 2. The trimmed mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 100.

protocol.name: P-G17675-5
protocol.text: Trizol extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.
